text: Golaghmuli Valley is a high mountainous valley in Upper Ghizer of Gilgit- Baltistan Pakistan. This valley is east of Chitral and north of Swat. Golaghmuli Valley is separated from the Chitral and Swat by high mountain passes. To reach Golaghmuli Valley, a person must take the Gilgit-Chitral road west from Gilgit, and then continue straight by Gupis. After Gupis, one continues northwest to reach the Yasin Valley and the straight road goes to Golaghmuli Valley. Golaghmuli Valley has a spectacular natural beauty. == Villages == * Golaghmuli * Golaghtori * Herkush * Handarap * Teru * Barset * Terich * Ali Abad == Climate == ==References== Category:Gilgit-Baltistan
title: Golaghmuli Valley
